Hi, I'm Josh! I'm a greenhouse technician at Summit Plant Labs and an educator at the Environmental Learning Center in Fort Collins. I'm interested in incorporating native seed conservation to help communities build a sense of place. In my free time, I enjoy biking, hiking, and playing my songs.
